message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.NA, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with the problem of learning high-dimensional simplices from uniformly-sampled observations, which is a fundamental problem in machine learning and statistics. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), which deals with the theory and applications of machine learning algorithms. The paper also involves computational geometry and optimization, which are relevant to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.IT (Information Theory), respectively. The authors also mention remote sensing and computational biology, which are relevant to cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) and cs.CV (Computer Vision), respectively.
